item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-04-15
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Tango Mango Taqueria (1191 Centre St, Newton). #
  • ACL visits Umami Burger in LA - #
  • RT @slashfood: McDonald's refuses to change small percentage of eggs to the cage-free variety: (via @gogreenologist) #
  • I'm at NameMedia (230 Third Ave, Waltham). #
  • Used Opera on my iPhone for 30 seconds. Closed & went back 2 Safari. Why is Opera popular? #

Powered by Twitter Tools
